data.eml:eml: The goblin spider genus Ischnothyreus (Araneae, Oonopidae) in Java and Sumatra

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Richard, Miguel, Graber, Werner, Kropf, Christian (2016): The goblin spider genus Ischnothyreus (Araneae, Oonopidae) in Java and Sumatra. Zootaxa 4151 (1): 1-99, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4151.1.1
